albany.neighborhoods: Delaware Ave, Center Square, Pine Hills, Arbor Hill, West Hill, Buckingham
albany.meetingHighlights: Active morning and evening meetings clustered around Center Square and Pine Hills; steady intergroup activity and outreach.
albany.transitInfo: CDTA buses serve the Capital District with frequent routes into downtown; Albany International Airport (ALB) offers regional flights.

buffalo.neighborhoods: Downtown, Allentown, Elmwood Village, North Buffalo, West Side, South Buffalo
buffalo.meetingHighlights: Diverse meetings in Allentown and Elmwood Village with an active central office; numerous evening and speaker meetings.
buffalo.transitInfo: NFTA Metro buses and light rail connect key neighborhoods; Buffalo Niagara International Airport (BUF) is north of the city.

new-york.neighborhoods: Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, The Bronx, Staten Island, Midtown, Upper East Side, Lower East Side
new-york.meetingHighlights: Extensive, long-established AA community with meetings across all boroughs, including 24-hour and specialty meetings in Manhattan and Greenwich Village.
new-york.transitInfo: Comprehensive MTA subway and bus network across the five boroughs; major airports include JFK, LaGuardia (LGA), and Newark (EWR).

rochester.neighborhoods: Downtown, Park Avenue, Neighborhood of the Arts, Corn Hill, Brighton, Gates
rochester.meetingHighlights: Strong downtown and Park Avenue groups with active Big Book and step-study meetings; annual area conventions draw participants from the region.
rochester.transitInfo: Rochester Regional Transit Service (RTS) buses cover the metro area; Greater Rochester International Airport (ROC) serves the region.

syracuse.neighborhoods: Downtown, University Hill, Tipperary Hill, Eastwood, Westcott, Near Westside
syracuse.meetingHighlights: Active meetings near Syracuse University on University Hill and a variety of community meetings downtown; schedules include study and speaker formats.
syracuse.transitInfo: Centro bus network serves Syracuse and surrounding towns; Syracuse Hancock International Airport (SYR) handles regional flights.

yonkers.neighborhoods: Downtown Yonkers, Getty Square, Sprain Brook, Glenwood, Colonial Heights, Park Hill
yonkers.meetingHighlights: Meetings concentrated around Getty Square and downtown Yonkers with convenient access for commuters traveling to NYC meetings.
yonkers.transitInfo: Bee-Line Bus network connects Yonkers neighborhoods; Metro-North Hudson Line provides frequent rail service into Manhattan.
